unnormalised: Nwngswm, nwngni tangkha ni documentswrkhw mwjang mwndang nangwnwi swlwng naikhw. Online transfers lao blang samay, IFSC code, SBIN0001234 nia baiswn khwblang gwnnw blabwi jaikhw. Arw thangwnmwnbw, nwngni PAN, jaise ABCDE1234F, taxni bagwi baiswn dwng. Hakhe, nwngni account number, jaise 91234567890, swlwng nangw arw lwidwng nangwnwi share dwnnangwi thwnangwi. Be IDs wrkhw mwndangnangwnangwnwi baidwng samay nwngni kwiswbw bwkwthi janai kham jaikhw!
normalised: Hoy, bwkhajaobw, nwina rwngnangni paisani kagojkhou mwjang mwjang sibigrina lanw. Nwina online ao paisa thanggwnw thanga I-F-S-C code khou sibigrina lanw, misal S-B-I-N zero zero zero one two three four. Aro gotho, nwina P-A-N, misal A-B-C-D-E one two three four F, tax ni jwnwmwng. Abw gotho, nwina account number, sanjai nwng nine one two three four five six seven eight nine zero, khou suruksha bibw aro binikhou lwgse lwgse share damthibw. I-D's khou mwnthainw nwngni somoikhou bachainwnw hwnw!
